function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?
Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i <= 3' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i <= 3' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition 'j <= 2 - i' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'j <= 2 - i' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i <= 3' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j <= 2 - i' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'i (line 5)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'j (line 5)' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 'i' live at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'j' live at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Is the statement 'for (k = 0; k <= 2 * i; k++)' unreachable?
Is this statement not dead: “for(i = 0; i <= 2; i++)”?
